name: adams_mcp
description: ADAMS MCP server providing NRC ADAMS search, download, and PDF text extraction tools for nuclear regulatory documents.
author: ADAMS MCP Project

tools.name: search_adams
tools.description: Search NRC ADAMS and Google for nuclear regulatory documents with hybrid results.

max_pages.description: Number of ADAMS pages to fetch (1-10)

top_n.description: Number of top results to return (1-50)

tools.name: download_adams
tools.description: Download an NRC document by accession number.

tools.name: summarize_pdf
tools.description: Extract text content from a downloaded ADAMS PDF file for LLM processing.
